professional_summary: Database professional with 6+ years of experience in Oracle and PostgreSQL administration, AWS migration expertise, and advanced database management skills.

key_responsibilities: Performing regular database backups and recovery operations.
Optimizing database performance using tuning tools like AWR and ASH.
Implementing high-availability solutions using Oracle Primary and Standby databases.
Managing database migrations using Toad Data Pump.
Performing disaster recovery testing with RMAN.
